title: Cars, Coffee, and a Badass Ninja Toilet
description: If you deal with customers day after day who drive you insane, give you reasons to drink alcohol, or make you want to quit your job, this book is definitely for you. A chaotic and hilarious portrait of a used car lot owner, Julia Karr.
